name.ja: ナイトメア・アイズ・サクリファイス

text.en:
2 monsters with different Types (Fiend, Illusion, or Spellcaster)
If this card is Special Summoned, or at the end of the Battle Phase, if this card battled: You can equip 1 monster your opponent controls to this card as an Equip Spell. You can only use this effect of "Nightmare-Eyes Restrict" once per turn. Gains ATK equal to the combined ATK of those equipped monsters. If this card battles a monster, neither can be destroyed by that battle. Your opponent's monsters cannot attack monsters, except this one.
